== UPPERCASE & LOWERCASE ==
   vEpU - uppercase a word
   u   - lowercase 
   
   exp. v - visual
        E - end of the word
        U - uppercase
        
== INSERT ==
   a - insert after the cursor line 
   A - insert to the end of the line
   o - inssert below the line
   O - insert above the line

== DELETE ==
   dj - delete current and below line 
   dk - delete current and above line
   d0 - delete end of the line up to the first line 
   dd - delete the entire line
   dw - delete a word
   d2w - delete two words
